# 00_all

### This is our final Quarto Markdown document with all other documents embedded and rendered

Run this chunk only

```{r}
library(quarto)
files_to_render <- c(
  "00_all.qmd",
  "01_load.qmd",
  "02_clean.qmd",
  "03_augment.qmd",
  "04_describe.qmd",
  "05_analysis_1.qmd",
  "06_analysis_2.qmd",
  "07_analysis_3.qmd"
)

quarto_render(
  input_files = files_to_render,
  output_dir = "../results",
  output_format = "html_document"
)
```
